text: Khloe Kardashian once was known as the chubby Keeping Up with the Kardashians sister. But after putting herself on a strict diet and fitness plan, Khloe achieved a 40 - pound weight loss and a stunning revenge body, as the Inquisitr reported. After facing rumors for years about her desire to become a mom like her sisters Kourtney and Kim Kardashian, Khloe reportedly has become pregnant.
